Title: Blindness
Overview: When a sudden plague of blindness devastates a city, a small group of the afflicted band together to triumphantly overcome the horrific conditions of their imposed quarantine.
Tagline: Your vision of the world will change forever.
production_companies: Rhombus Media, O2 Filmes, Téléfilm Canada, Bee Vine Pictures, Alliance Films, Asmik Ace Entertainment, GAGA, Fox Filmes do Brasil, Ancine, BNDES, Cinema Investment, Corus Entertainment, Movie Central Network
Cast: Julianne Moore, Mark Ruffalo, Alice Braga
